first_reading.text:
[[1_P 2,2]]Beloved, like newborn infants, long for pure spiritual milk so that through it you may grow into salvation,
[[1_P 2,3]]for you have tasted that the Lord is good.
[[1_P 2,4]]Come to him, a living stone, rejected by human beings but chosen and precious in the sight of God,
[[1_P 2,5]]and, like living stones, let yourselves be built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood to offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
[[1_P 2,9]]But you are "a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people of his own, so that you may announce the praises" of him who called you out of darkness into his wonderful light.
[[1_P 2,10]]Once you were "no people" but now you are God's people; you "had not received mercy" but now you have received mercy.
[[1_P 2,11]]Beloved, I urge you as aliens and sojourners to keep away from worldly desires that wage war against the soul.
[[1_P 2,12]]Maintain good conduct among the Gentiles, so that if they speak of you as evildoers, they may observe your good works and glorify God on the day of visitation.
first_reading.title: First Letter of Peter

gospel.text:
[[Mc 10,46]]As Jesus was leaving Jericho with his disciples and a sizable crowd, Bartimaeus, a blind man, the son of Timaeus, sat by the roadside begging.
[[Mc 10,47]]On hearing that it was Jesus of Nazareth, he began to cry out and say, "Jesus, son of David, have pity on me."
[[Mc 10,48]]And many rebuked him, telling him to be silent. But he kept calling out all the more, "Son of David, have pity on me."
[[Mc 10,49]]Jesus stopped and said, "Call him." So they called the blind man, saying to him, "Take courage; get up, he is calling you."
[[Mc 10,50]]He threw aside his cloak, sprang up, and came to Jesus.
[[Mc 10,51]]Jesus said to him in reply, "What do you want me to do for you?" The blind man replied to him, "Master, I want to see."
[[Mc 10,52]]Jesus told him, "Go your way; your faith has saved you." Immediately he received his sight and followed him on the way.
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Mark
